Check to See if NCO is on the system

Source: R/forecasts-nc.R
check_nco.Rd

NCO is a fantastic open source tool for working with NetCDF files. It can be downloaded from here: http://nco.sourceforge.net/#Source

check_nco()

Value

a boolean condition

Examples

check_nco()

#> [1] TRUE
